name: Angry Birds: Summer Madness
overview: Teen birds Red, Chuck, Bomb and Stella are crashing through Camp Splinterwood with their fellow feathered campers for a summer of high-flying hijinks!

episodes.name: Cabin Raid!
episodes.overview: Care packages are plopping into camp. But when bully Neiderflyer steals the Hatchlings’ delivery, Red and the crew raid the cabins to get it back.

episodes.name: Hospital Sweet
episodes.overview: Candy’s not allowed at camp, but Chuck’s nurse visits lead to sweet treats for everyone — and a potential spot for him on the Stall of Fame!

episodes.name: Microphone Mayhem!
episodes.overview: Bomb can make his voice sound just like camp director Lynette's, so Red sneaks him into the office to play some wacky tricks over the PA system.

episodes.name: Dodgebirds
episodes.overview: When her dodgebird team needs a new coach, Stella doesn’t quit until she convinces former champ Harold to help them win a big tournament.

episodes.name: It's Raining, It's Boring
episodes.overview: Wet weather’s keeping the entire camp stuck indoors. But Chuck can’t keep still and leads his friends on a wild and muddy day in the rain.

episodes.name: The Big Bird Bake Off
episodes.overview: Fizzlenut berries, truffles and more! Bomb bakes a mouthwatering cake for the camp competition but learns that winning isn't always what it seems.

episodes.name: Much Ado About Pudding
episodes.overview: The lunchtime pudding cannon can’t reach the Hatchlings, so Red decides to help the hungry chicks — even if it means making nice with his nemesis.

episodes.name: The New Pig
episodes.overview: When Penley the pig camper mistakenly lands at the birds' camp, Red and the squad give him the grand tour and help him get settled.

episodes.name: Space Oddities
episodes.overview: How high can their rockets fly? Stella challenges her rival Robin in building a record-breaking rocket... and accidentally blasts off into outer space.

episodes.name: Bomb's Away!
episodes.overview: When Bomb uses trampolines to bounce away from the crowded camp, Red and friends must find a way to keep the other campers from launching out, too.

episodes.name: Splashageddon!
episodes.overview: Red and crew can’t miss the best day of summer just because Lynette wants them to clean their cabins. Can they tunnel their way to fun at the lake?

episodes.name: Misadventures in Hatchling-sitting
episodes.overview: Bomb volunteers his friends to watch Matilda's pint-sized Hatchlings. But he isn’t prepared for the baby chicks to bounce out of control.

episodes.name: The Golden Pineapple
episodes.overview: It’s Red vs. Stella in a game of Capture the Golden Pineapple. Will the ruthless competition ruffle the feathers of their friendship?

episodes.name: A-Haw-Haw
episodes.overview: When a fancy yacht launches into camp for Chuck, Neiderflyer teaches him how to live the luxurious life and throw a smashing party.

episodes.name: Stopped Short
episodes.overview: Red and the Hatchlings are too short to ride the lake’s big slide. But Red's determined to sneak on and experience the fun with his new friends.

episodes.name: Fowl Weather
episodes.overview: When Red catches Lynette in a lie, the entire camp stops listening to anything she says — and chaos spreads throughout the campground.

episodes.name: Be Careful What You Fish For
episodes.overview: The whole camp's happy because of Bomb's crispy and delicious fish sticks! But a lake monster also wants a bite of the tasty treats.

episodes.name: A Knight's Tailfeathers
episodes.overview: Stella ends up saving the day after Red and pals challenge Neiderflyer to a joust match during the camp's medieval-themed weekend.

episodes.name: Chuck-In-A-Box
episodes.overview: Chuck's in big trouble, so Bomb takes time out of his day of relaxation to help Chuck lie low inside his special box.

episodes.name: The Un-Chuckening
episodes.overview: After Chuck lands an impossible stunt, Stella tries to get him to focus and train to become an Eggs Games champ — just like Toby Hawk.

episodes.name: Detective Chuck
episodes.overview: Chuck's on the case to nab a mysterious nighttime bandit who's plucking out everyone's feathers.

episodes.name: Friendship Falls
episodes.overview: Red, Stella and crew try to prove that they're still the bestest best friends... even after they fail the camp's friendship course.

episodes.name: Bomb's the Bomb
episodes.overview: Whenever Bomb's around Matilda, his nerves turn his explosions into fireworks for all of the camp's celebrations.

episodes.name: Chill Hard
episodes.overview: Stella's having a hard time trying not to be so competitive, so she gets tips on how to chill out from the easygoing Mighty Eagle.

episodes.name: Pillow Fight Club
episodes.overview: The only rule of Pillow Fight Club is to never talk about it. But Chuck has a hard time keeping it a secret from Red and Stella.

episodes.name: Let's Bounce
episodes.overview: Red is a really bad bouncer, so why would Stella's cabin mate Robin ask him to bounce with her? Stella's determined to find out.

episodes.name: Fly Like a Mighty Eagle
episodes.overview: Chuck's so starstruck after seeing the Mighty Eagle fly that he tries to teach himself how to be a flying bird — instead of just a crashing one.

episodes.name: The Sabirdteur
episodes.overview: Red thinks it's too dangerous for Stella to beat terrible Terence at any competition. So Red goes to great lengths to keep her out of trouble.

episodes.name: Prematurely Balding Eagle
episodes.overview: After giving Mighty Eagle a horrible haircut, Red and crew try all the tricks to help Mighty Eagle's flowing locks grow back.

episodes.name: Pranks a Lot
episodes.overview: Pig Camp pranksters are causing a mess, so Red and friends think of ways to hit back with their own extreme antics.

episodes.name: Crash Course
episodes.overview: The sight of a spinning wheel leaves Red dizzy and conks him out. Can the pals help Red recover in time to beat Neiderflyer at the demolition park?

episodes.name: Splinter-Camp Games
episodes.overview: Red joins his rivals from the Pig Camp when Lynette doubts he has the smashing skills to earn a spot on Camp Splinterwood's team.
